PageTitle: display qos hard-pipe statistics interface outbound
FuncDef: The display qos hard-pipe statistics interface outbound command displays hard pipe statistics about outgoing traffic on the PW-side or AC-side hard pipe interface.
CLIs: display qos hard-pipe statistics interface <interface-name> outbound
display qos hard-pipe statistics interface { <interface-name> | <interface-type> <interface-number> } outbound

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies an interface type and number.
-

Examples: <HUAWEI> display qos hard-pipe statistics interface gigabitethernet2/0/0 outbound
Last 5 minutes pass rate: 0 pps, 0 bps
Last 5 minutes discard rate: 0 pps, 0 bps
ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
To check hard pipe statistics of outgoing traffic on a PW-side or AC-side hard pipe interface, run the display qos hard-pipe statistics command.
